KA11R.RG.summary: A/S Kurzemes Atslega 1 engages in the manufacture of hardware for windows and doors, and metal forgings; and metalworking and woodworking activities in Latvia, Lithuania, Estonia, Uzbekistan, the Netherlands, Denmark, Russia, Vacija, and internationally. It offers hardware for doors and windows, such as door locks and handles, furniture hardware, padlocks, window hardware, door and gate hinges, mortise locks, and rim locks. The company also manufactures stamping dies and molds, as well as repairs them. In addition, it provides metalworking works, which includes stamping, folding, turning, welding and grinding, and milling and sawing of parts; and punching and cutting of metal sheets, bending of metals, plasma cutting, powder coating, and tempering services. Additionally, the company also provides zinc, chrome, and nickel plated coatings; forged metal gates, fences, and handrails for stairs and balconies; CNC turning and milling; aluminum and zinc casting; plastic molding; and powder painting services. Further, it manufactures and installs wooden panel and frame houses, and mobile and module houses; constructs wooden frame houses, as well as customizes orders for manufacture and installation of houses; and provides perforated plates and various connecting pieces for construction. The company was founded in 1890 and is based in Aizpute, Latvia.
